Welcome to the Ottium info page! Ottium is an object-based non-intrusive way of testing your apps across all OTT platforms - Smart TVs, Mobile, Web and Game consoles. Automate your testing by getting insights from your application without running any SDK or library inside your app.

Features

Ottium gives you several advantages in comparison with other testing platforms.

</>

No Instrumentation

Test without modifying your source code. Ottium works with your apps as-is, no SDK or library injection required.

üñ•Ô∏è

Cross-platform

Create test scenarios once, execute anywhere. No matter if testing on for Smart TVs, set-top-boxes, mobile, web or consoles.

‚ö°

Fast execution

Execute your test cases on hundreds of devices simultaneously. Speed up your regression and get results in minutes, not hours.
